main event: On August 18, 1960, a football-shaped object was observed in Fairfield, California.
interesting points: The object was solid reddish-white in color and its flight path was described as erratic with very high speed,The object was reported by both civilian and military observers,Descriptions in the reports suggest the object might have been a meteor,Observation included a detailed assessment of its speed and altitude,Additional reports mentioned a circular object emitting soft white light, observed hovering.
witness description: A military captain and two witnesses who were present on base at that time
